items.text: flighted around off and goes on with the arm to beat the bat and barely miss off-stump
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: pushes across a fuller one that's drilled away to cover
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: straightens on off, backs away and cuts to sweeper cover
items.shortText: Chahal to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: floated up on leg, driven to cover
items.shortText: Chahal to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.preText: Faiz: "This Asia Cup has been a nightmare. Weirdest scheduling I have ever seen, plus, totally one sided contests, barring India-HK probably, and at a neutral venue + killer weather. I am going back to re-read Indian-Eng test series commentary, now that was fun!" Test is always best.
items.text: pushes a fuller one into the covers
items.shortText: Chahal to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: lets this length ball spin before playing late on the bounce to second slip
items.shortText: Chahal to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: drives a fuller one to long-off
items.shortText: Chahal to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.text: spins away outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Chahal to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: flighted on middle, driven to long-off
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.preText: Raghu Raghavend: "I see that Akshay is not getting any chance to post any comments with the speed of Indian bowling their overs!"
items.text: fullish length, spins down leg, gets it away through square leg
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: flighted outside off, driven to cover
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: Dhoni whips the bails off as Mosaddek is deceived by this wrong'un. Lovely bowling. Tosses it up and draws him forward. Really has to reach out but the backfoot never left the ground
items.postText: bhaskar: "Jinxing again..5 overs since last boundary"
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: shifts back and keeps out a wrong'un
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: full, comes on with the angle outside off, eased down to long-off
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.preText: A hundred-and-eight off the 162 balls so far have been dots. That's 18 overs of no run. Stats like these hurt badly in the modern game.
items.text: stays back to defend a back of a length delivery, chops it into the ground close to the feet
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mosaddek Hossain, no run

items.text: reaches out to a short one and guides it away to third man
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.preText: Ramesh says: "I can't understand why everyone is creating such a fuss over scheduling - a) back to back ODI games were very common in the 80s b) Dubai and Abu Dhabi are just 150 kms apart (less than 2 hrs drive)"
items.text: short of a length, angling into off, blocked to point off the backfoot
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: shortish on off, pushes back and knocks it to short third man
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: full, deceptively skiddy, hurriedly kept out from the crease
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: length on off, defended back
items.shortText: Bumrah to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: waits and tucks a straight length ball to square leg
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

items.preText: rana: "Its about fairness @Ramesh. One particular time does not have to travel at all while the others have to shuttle back and forth!"
items.text: here's the wrong'un again, lands full around leg stump, skips into the off side off the leading edge
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: googly, off the outside edge this time, into the off side
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: Chahal lets one go straight through the legs as Mahmudullah cuts through point
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

items.text: backs away to slap it away but is forced to withdraw as he moves too far
items.shortText: Kuldeep Yadav to Mahmudullah, no run
